casebody.data:
Penelope STILLWELL and William Stillwell, Appellants-Plaintiffs,
v.
EAGLE-KIRKPATRICK MANAGEMENT COMPANY, INC., Kirkpatrick Management Company, Inc., G.T. Services, Inc., d/b/a Green Touch Services, Inc., and Sycamore Springs Section C Homeowners Association, Inc., Appellees-Defendants,
v.
Cohen & Malad, LLP, Appellee-Intervenor. Court of Appeals Case No. 49A02-1708-CT-1919 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed July 6, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

FRIEDLANDER , Sr.J. Affirmed. ROBB, J., Concurs.

MATHIAS, J., Concurs.
